column1: It's easy but sneaky ; you ferry a dump of fuel, shielding, a nuke and a missile, load up on fuel and a nuke, fly out and up eight clicks, drop the nuke at the foot of the mountains, power - dive back down to base, load the shielding, fuel to the max with just one missile aboard ( meanwhile the nuke explodes, shaking the ground ; you don't want to be fuelling at this point ), then you climb like fuck, get to ceiling and then hover in the air above the rising mushroom cloud!
